Summary: Close the app: task list clears up
Description:
**Pre-conditions:**

There are some tasks in the list.



**STR:**

1. Close the app.
2. Open the app.

   

**Expected result:**

Tasks list isn't changed.



**Actual result:**

Tasks list is cleared up.

Summary: Statistics: zero value for completed tasks
Description:
**Pre-conditions:**

There are some active and completed tasks in the list.

Statistics screen is opened.



**Expected result:**

There is a correct statistics for completed tasks.



**Actual result:**

No statistics for completed tasks (0 value).

Summary: New TO-DO: the back button doesn't work
Description:
**Pre-conditions:**

The new TO-DO screen is opened.

Fields could be filled or empty.



**STR:**

1. Tap the back button.

**Expected result:**

The main screen opens.



**Actual result:**

Nothing happens, user remains on the new TO-DO screen.

Summary: New TO-DO, title field: layout bug when typing text longer than string (31 symbols)
Description:
**Pre-conditions:**

New to-do screen is opened.



**STR:**

1. Enter 31 symbols into the title field.

**Expected result:**

Text is fisplayed correctly on the 2 strings.



**Actual result:**

Layuot bug. Full text connot be shown.

Summary: Edit task: the back button doesn't work
Description:
**Pre-conditions:**

The task was created.

The edit task screen is opened.



**STR:**

1. Tap the back button.

   

**Expected result:**

The main screen opens.



**Actual result:**

Nothing happens, user remains on the edit task screen.

Summary: Unable to edit task + title misprint "edite"
Description:
**Pre-conditions:**

The task was created.

The task screen is opened.



**STR:**

1. Tap the edit button.
2. Make some changes.
3. Tap the save button.

**Expected result:**

Changes are saved.



**Actual result:**

Changes aren't saved.

The title misprint "Edit**e**"

Summary: Action menu: completed tasks cannot be cleared
Description:
**Pre-conditions:**

There are some active and completed tasks in the list.

Main screen screen is opened.



**STR:**

1. Tap the action menu icon.
2. Tap the clear completed button.

**Expected result:**

Completed tasks are cleared.



**Actual result:**

Completed tasks aren't cleared.

Summary: Action menu: crash after tapping the refresh button
Description:
**Pre-conditions:**

Main screen is opened.



**STR:**

1. Tap the action menu icon.
2. Tap the refresh button.

**Expected result:**

Tasks list is refreshed.



**Actual result:**

App crashes.

Summary: Completed tasks filter: "You have no complited TO-DOs!" misprint
Description:
**Pre-conditions:**

There are no completed tasks.



**STR:**

1. Tap the filter icon on the main screen.
2. Tap the completed button



**Expected result:**

"You have no completed TO-DOs!" stub is displayed."



**Actual result:**

"You have no complited TO-DOs!" stub is displayed."

Summary: New TO-DO: tasks with numbers and spec. chars aren't saved, tasks list clears up
Description:
**Pre-conditions:**

There are some tasks in the list.

New to-do screen is opened.



**STR:**

1. Enter some text comprising special characters/numbers into the title/task description field.
2. Tap the save button.



**Expected result:**

Task is saved.



**Actual result:**

Task isn't saved.

Tasks list clears up.

Summary: Filter, active tasks: completed tasks aren't hidden
Description:
**Pre-conditions:**

There are some active and completed tasks in the list.

Main screen screen is opened.



**STR:**

1. Enter some text comprising special characters/numbers into the title/task description field.
2. Tap the save button.



**Expected result:**

Task is saved.



**Actual result:**

Task isn't saved.

Tasks list clears up.
